name: sourceAccountId
description: Account id of proposer, which will be used to fund ephemeral accounts.

name: nonceAccountId
description: Account id of a nonce account that is controlled by the turret signers and has min. 3.6 XLM

name: turretSigners
description: List of turret contract signers of the proposal account.

name: daoTomlHost
description: Link to DAO address wich publishes <daoTomlHost>/.well-known/dao.toml.

name: proposalLink
description: Link to Proposal Data Structure. Max 64 chars.
